data.meta_description: PATH Belgium │ a dynamic hub in Brussels.
data.text:
2023 annual report

Navigate through the report using the "Read more" links below, or, the text links at the bottom of each page. To view a PDF instead, click here.

UHC by 2030

Universal health coverage (UHC) is for everyone. Realizing the vision of “health for all” will require a historic effort spanning sectors and borders. Everyone has a role to play—we're proud to do our part.

Creating a collaborative workplace that challenges the status quo, embraces new ideas, and values different perspectives.

The world wasn’t ready for this pandemic, but we can be ready for the next.

Navigate through the report using the "Read more" links below, or, the text links at the bottom of each page. To view a PDF instead, click here.

Universal health coverage (UHC) is for everyone. Realizing the vision of “health for all” will require a historic effort spanning sectors and borders. Everyone has a role to play—we're proud to do our part.

High-impact corporate partnerships are essential to global health progress. At PATH, we partner with corporations that are innovative, bold, and focused on impact.
